name: HTML
details: Proficient in HTML5, ensuring clean, semantic markup for responsive and SEO-friendly websites.

name: CSS
details: Skilled in CSS, SCSS, and frameworks like Bootstrap, creating visually appealing, modern, and responsive designs.

name: TypeScript
details: Strong understanding of TypeScript for scalable, maintainable web applications with static typing and OOP principles.

name: C++
details: Experienced in C++ OOP, data structures, and algorithms and focusing on performance

name: Python
details: Proficient in Python for automation, data analysis, and web development, leveraging libraries and frameworks efficiently.

name: Angular
details: Hands-on experience with Angular, building dynamic, scalable web applications with components, services, and routing.

name: Linux
details: Familiar with Linux for development, scripting, and system management.

name: Github
details: Proficient in GitHub for version control, branching, and collaborative development.
